history.proof: intros a b l H1 H2. inversion H1; subst. - inversion H2. - shelve.

ctx: intros a b l H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (a b : A) (l : list A), ordered (a :: b :: l) -> order a b" on hypothesis of type "order a b0".

ctx: intros a b l H1 H2.
exceptions.tactic: apply (order_trans a b b) in H3; auto.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "order a b -> order b b -> order a b" on hypothesis of type "order a b0".

chat.content:
A: Type
order: A -> A -> Prop
order_trans: forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c
============================
forall (a b : A) (l : list A), ordered (a :: l) -> In b l -> order a b

Inductive ordered : list A -> Prop := ordered_nil : ordered nil | ordered_one : forall a : A, ordered (a :: nil) | ordered_cons : forall (a b : A) (l : list A), order a b -> ordered (b :: l) -> ordered (a :: b :: l) Arguments ordered _%list_scope Arguments ordered_cons _ _ _%list_scope

map_ext_in_iff : map ?f ?l = map ?g ?l < -> (forall a : ?A, In a ?l -> ?f a = ?g a) where ?A : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Type] ?B : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- Type] ?f : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- ?A -> ?B] ?g : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- ?A -> ?B] ?l : [A : Type order : A -> A -> Prop order_trans : forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c |- list ?A]

Inductive ordered : list A -> Prop := ordered_nil : ordered nil | ordered_one : forall a : A, ordered (a :: nil) | ordered_cons : forall (a b : A) (l : list A), order a b -> ordered (b :: l) -> ordered (a :: b :: l) Arguments ordered _%list_scope Arguments ordered_cons _ _ _%list_scope
in_inv : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l : list A), In b (a :: l) -> a = b \/ In b l
Contradict1 : forall a b : Prop, b -> (a -> ~ b) -> ~ a
ordered_skip : forall (a b : A) (l : list A), ordered (a :: b :: l) -> ordered (a :: l)
in_map_inv : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (b : B) (l : list A), In b (map f l) -> exists a : A, In a l /\ b = f a
in_cons : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l : list A), In b l -> In b (a :: l)
in_flat_map_ex : forall (B C : Type) (l : list B) (f : B -> list C) (a : C), In a (flat_map f l) -> exists b : B, In b l /\ In a (f b)
find_min_correct : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l : list A), match find_min f l with | Some (a, b) => (In b l /\ a = f b) /\ (forall c : A, In c l -> f b <= f c) | None => l = nil end
Relation_Operators.Ltl_ind : forall (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), (forall (a : A) (x : list A), P nil (a :: x)) -> (forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, P (a :: x) (b :: y)) -> (forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> P x y -> P (a :: x) (a :: y)) -> forall l l0 : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA l l0 -> P l l0

in_flat_map : forall (B C : Type) (l : list B) (f : B -> list C) (a : C) (b : B), In a (f b) -> In b l -> In a (flat_map f l)
Bool.orb_prop : forall a b : bool, (a || b)%bool = true -> a = true \/ b = true
find_max_correct : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> nat) (l : list A), match find_max f l with | Some (a, b) => (In b l /\ a = f b) /\ (forall c : A, In c l -> f c <= f b) | None => l = nil end
permutation_sind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> SProp), P nil nil -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P nil nil -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
app_inv_app2 : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A) (a b : A), l1 ++ l2 = l3 ++ a :: b :: l4 -> (exists l5 : list A, l1 = l3 ++ a :: b :: l5) \/ (exists l5 : list A, l2 = l5 ++ a :: b :: l4) \/ l1 = l3 ++ a :: nil /\ l2 = b :: l4
Inductive Ltl (A : Set) (leA : A -> A -> Prop) : list A -> list A -> Prop := Lt_nil : forall (a : A) (x : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA nil (a :: x) | Lt_hd : forall a b : A, leA a b -> forall x y : list A, Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA (a :: x) (b :: y) | Lt_tl : forall (a : A) (x y : list A), Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA x y -> Relation_Operators.Ltl A leA (a :: x) (a :: y) Arguments Relation_Operators.Ltl _%type_scope _%function_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_nil _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_hd _%type_scope _%function_scope _ _ _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments Relation_Operators.Lt_tl _%type_scope _%function_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope
permutation_swap : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l : list A), permutation (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)
Inductive permutation (A : Type) : list A -> list A -> Prop := permutation_nil : permutation nil nil | permutation_skip : forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1) | permutation_swap : forall (a b : A) (l : list A), permutation (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l) | permutation_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> permutation l1 l3 Arguments permutation [A]%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments permutation_nil _%type_scope Arguments permutation_skip _%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments permutation_swap _%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope Arguments permutation_trans _%type_scope (_ _ _)%list_scope

``` 
intros a b l H1 H2.
inversion H1; subst.
- inversion H2.
- apply ordered_inv_order in H3.
  apply (order_trans a b b) in H3; assumption. 
Qed. 
```

original: intros a b l H1 H2. inversion H1; subst. - inversion H2. - apply ordered_inv_order in H3. apply (order_trans a b b) in H3; auto.
